data=read.csv("50_Startups.csv",header=T)
View(data[c(1,2,3,5)])
plot(data[c(1,2,3,5)])
data=as.matrix(data[c(1,2,3,5)])
k=kmeans(data,2)
plot(data,col=k$cluster)
View(k)
cor(data)
d=dist(data,"euclidean")
h=hclust(d,"ward.D2")
plot(h$height)
X11()
plot(h)
rect.hclust(h,3)
c=cutree(h,3)
X11()
plot(data, col=c)
